title: Australia v England: Ashes second Test, day two – live
summary: The tourists were bowled out for 334 runs, while Joe Root scored an unbeaten century. The second day of play at the Gabba saw significant contributions from Root. Follow our writers for ongoing match updates.

title: Sydney records highest temperature in nearly two years amid heatwave as Tasmanian bushfires threaten homes
summary: Heatwave warnings have been issued for several regions in Australia, including New South Wales, the Northern Territory, Queensland, and Western Australia. Authorities are advising residents to take precautions against extreme temperatures. The warnings highlight the potential risks to health and safety during this intense heat event.

title: Simon Cowell: The Next Act to Taylor Swift: The End of an Era – the seven best shows to stream this week
summary: The music mogul is set to create a new boyband through a series of boot camps and eliminations. Fans can also look forward to a special surprise for Swifties. Excitement builds as the project gears up for launch.

title: What I saw reporting on the American lives cut short by killer heat
summary: To receive updates from Down to Earth directly in your inbox, sign up for their newsletter. Stay informed with the latest news and insights from the publication. Don't miss out on important content—subscribe today!

title: Strauss: An Alpine Symphony; Four Songs Op 27 album review – Nothing is overblown or indulgent
summary: Conductor Nicholas Collon delivers a clear and dynamic recording, showcasing a vibrant sound. Louise Alder's performance in the Four Songs op 27 is notably expressive and engaging. Overall, the recording is praised for its energy and communication.
